entry.title: Dr. Schmood's Notebook of Python Calisthenics and Orthodontia
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: David Schmudde

Track:PyConDE Explore the benefits of taking a functional approach when writing Python in Jupyter notebooks: reduce errors caused by out-of-order execution and hidden state while producing more readable code.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/F3TCZN Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
